positions.description: Responsibilities Included: Managing the scope, budget and schedule for the design and construction of projects. Managing all facets of the project process including initial planning, budgeting, hiring of consultants, maintaining design schedule, bidding and negotiation, construction administration and coordinating among the various regulatory entities.
positions.title: Project Manager

positions.description: Responsibilities Included: Lead the Facilities Operations and Development office in all phases of the project process including initial planning, budget, hiring of consultants, maintaining the design schedule, bidding and negotiation, construction administration. Negotiating various planning, design and construction contracts. Acting as a liaison between the university and regulatory entities.Led and managed high level project teams and user groups. Effectively communicated with a diverse range of individuals and groups both inside and outside of the University.  Served as the leader on renovation and construction project teams.
positions.title: Project Manager
